content.value_statement: Content creators spend too much time deciding which topics to write about. This skill scores and filters collected materials using a 10-point weighted system based on trending, controversy, value, and relevance criteria, helping prioritize high-potential content.
actual_capabilities: Score topics on 4 weighted criteria: trending (0-4), controversy (0-2), value (0-3), relevance (0-1)
Filter materials into 3 tiers: creation pool (7+ points), pending (5-6 points), rejected (<5 points)
Read user profile for personalized relevance scoring based on account positioning
Generate structured markdown reports with topic recommendations and next steps
Support input from x-collect output, manual topic lists, or raw text evaluation
Allow customizable scoring weights and threshold in user-profile.yaml
limitations: Does not collect topics independently; requires input from x-collect or user-provided list
Scoring is subjective and based on human judgment of criteria
Does not create content; only filters and recommends topics for creation
Default domains assume AI, tech, entrepreneurship focus if no user profile exists

faq.question: What input formats does x-filter accept?
faq.answer: x-filter accepts three input types: output from x-collect, manual topic lists you provide, and raw text for evaluation. The skill processes each material and scores it against the four criteria.

faq.question: How does the scoring system work?
faq.answer: The skill uses a 10-point system with four criteria: Trending (0-4 points), Controversy (0-2 points), Value (0-3 points), and Relevance (0-1 point). Topics scoring 7+ enter the creation pool.

faq.question: Can I customize the scoring weights?
faq.answer: Yes. You can set custom weights for each criterion in user-profile.yaml. The default weights are trending=4, controversy=2, value=3, relevance=1. You can also adjust the 7-point threshold.

faq.question: What is the user profile file for?
faq.answer: The user profile at ~/.claude/skills/x-create/references/user-profile.md defines your account domains and persona style. This enables personalized relevance scoring based on how well each topic aligns with your content focus.

faq.question: Does x-filter create content?
faq.answer: No. x-filter only scores and filters topics. After filtering, you can use x-create to generate actual X content from the recommended topics. These skills work together in a complete workflow.
